title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it fails to take focus.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not result in it taking focus. It only takes focus if the combo list is dropped down.
EB: The first Combo should take focus upon clicking, without requiring the dropdown action.
SR:
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
2. Press the 'Tab' key; focus should shift to the second Combo labeled 'Repository Path:'.
